message.content:
I need to identify and extract the value of costs related to general management and administration of the entity as a whole from the income statement.

Looking at the income statement, the line item that represents general management and administration costs is "Administrative Expenses".

In the provided problem, the Administrative Expenses are shown as 278023.19.

Therefore, the value of costs of general management and administration of the entity as a whole is 278023.19.

```json
{"solution": {'value': '278023.19'} }
```
